title: Plate, 1760s–80s
markings: On underside, underglaze signature [indecipherable]; paper label, "1617"
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2008: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Octagonal form with fluted rim with narrow green border; center well decorated with three Comedia dell'arte/Callot figures and foliage in green and ochre on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Plate, 1760s–80s.Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2008-40-1.
